page.title: 05Leisure activities
page.content: We went first around the First and Middle schools with our questionnaire, and then around the villagers of Pinvin. We asked them mainly about {sporting activities. Amongst the younger generation by far the most popular activity is {swimming.}The nearest pool is in Pershore where the staff are very keen to run special courses and clubs for children. This is an excellent amenity to have close by, and as such it is very well used. In the absence of other sports amenities children and adults alike seem to watch a great deal of {television.}Apart from this, adults and elderly people tend to enjoy {gardening}in their spare time. Some children were even recorded as saying that they did too !
